meanings.sent1: The plain, featureless wall blended into the background.
meanings.sent2: The featureless sky was a dull gray on that overcast day.
meanings.sent3: The featureless cookie was so bland, it tasted like cardboard.
meanings.sent4: Her face remained featureless, revealing no emotion.
meanings.sent5: The featureless landscape stretched out endlessly before us.

meanings.definition: Having no prominent or noticeable qualities.
meanings.sent1: The room was so featureless, it was easily forgettable.
meanings.sent2: His featureless voice made it hard to distinguish him in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The featureless movie was so boring, it put me to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The featureless painting failed to capture anyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The featureless building blended in with the rest of the cityscape.
